name: Windows Vista Simulator
description: Welcome to our new and fresh OS, this time you're going to enjoy it. There's a new 'Pack of Errors' installed in your computer (after you install WE2).  We have also made a new browser : Internet Surfer 8Contains Offline Internet mode.Enjoy. (No creepypasta trust me)  Credits :Microsoft for making that stupid Windows Vista that is no longer supported xDME for programming.
